DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this prospective study is to evaluate whether DNA methylation can be applied in cervical cancer screening.
DOC.brief_title: DNA Methylation Biomarkers for Cervical Cancer Screening
DOC.criteria: women with age â‰¥20 and sexual experience Agree to sign ICF women had received Hysterectomy women had destructive therapy for cervical lesions in 6 months, for examples: conization, Laser or cryotherapy, chemotherapy, and radiation therapy Women are at pregnancy or had baby delivery in 6 weeks
